Deberían de implementar un modo extra para jugar con otras personas[un modo en línea] pero fuera de eso el juego es lo máximo y me impresiona el nivel gráfico y la calidad de sonido junto a la jugabilidad son de lo mejor, gracias, compañia creadora de este genial juego[lamento el no saber el nombre de su compañia] espero sigan creando juegos fantásticos como este gracias por esta maravillosa entrega de Portal.
This game is an addictive puzzle solver perfect in displaying story, and an amazing community.

I originally got this game for the Xbox 360 and I loved it so much that I rebought it for PC. Huge fan of the series and the overall story. The puzzle aspect of the game is super fun in my opinion, the thought of flying through portals sounds awesome. Co-op is great if you got someone who knows the game's mechanics.  10/10 Highly Recommend

Portal 2 takes everything that was great about the original Portal and builds upon it. It's much longer, has just as good of a learning curve, builds upon the excellent environment of the first game, implements all of the new testing elements wonderfully, has a fantastic soundtrack, and features dialogue that's just as witty and hilarious as Portal 1's was. On top of that, there's also a two player co-op campaign that's just as fun as the singleplayer one (it's one of the best games to play with your SO), and the Steam Workshop integration and level editor provides literally endless content even after you've beaten the campaigns. It's fantastic, and every PC gamer worth their salt should definitely give it a spin.

Portal 2 is great, much bigger than first and with more elaborate and challenging levels. Use the same portal gun to restore order to portal base and find your way out...

Timeless without a doubt. One of the best games ever made, Portal 2 is a worthy follow-up to the fantastic original Portal game, and the purest example of good game design in every single aspect. All you need to play this game is your brain. Always remember to think with Portals, and if you're playing as a team, work and function as one.

Es un JU-E-GA-ZO. Lo juegues en solitario o en modo coop, es un must have si de verdad te consideras un verdadero amante de los videojuegos. La historia es larga y te da para partirte la cabeza varias veces, mucho más complicada que la primera entrega. El cooperativo está muy bien renderizado, es muy gracioso y está genial para pasar unas cuantas horas de diversión con amigos. Muchísimos niveles, mods, extras y contenido adicional está disponible, asi que no os vais a cansar de hacer miles y miles de pruebas diferentes creadas por la comunidad. Nada más que decir, es un juegazo, esperando a la 3a entrega.
Che dire, dopo anni esprimo la mia opinione su questo giochino, molto divertente,sia da solo che in compagnia, molto consigliato.

Этот обзор ещё не проанализирован нашей системой автоматической проверки контента. Он будет временно скрыт до тех пор, пока мы не убедимся, что он не содержит вредоносный контент (например, ссылки на сайты для кражи информации).
